Title: Yoshida no Time Slip Fumai-kou
Description: ['A Matsue City collaboration anime with ', Eagle Talon, ". A young Matsudaira Harusato (aka Matsudaira Fumai) who was once the ruled of Matsue time slips to the present. Yoshida ends up explaining Fumai's achievements to Fumai himself."]
Related: ['Sequel: Jibun no Mune ni te wo Atete']
